overview: 20 years ago, Johnny Porter evaded police custody for a murder charge in Pensacola, Florida and started a new life for himself up in Boston. Now living as Calvin Forrest, Johnny has been able to maintain a low profile while becoming a prominent figure in the city's criminal underbelly. However, Johnny's lifestyle of crime finally catches up to him when his apartment is broken into and his wife is taken. Listed as a prime suspect, Johnny is forced to skip town, but not before saving his wife and getting revenge on whoever tried to ruin his life.
tagline: Let me remind you who I am.
title: JOHNNY PORTER
